co.cask.cdap.api.app

Interface Application<T extends Config>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Config class that represents the configuration of the Application.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractApplication, AppReturnsArgs, ConfigTestApp, ConfigurableProgramsApp, ConfigurableProgramsApp2, FakeApp, PartitionExploreCorrector

    public interface Application<T extends Config>
    Defines a CDAP Application.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configure(ApplicationConfigurer configurer, ApplicationContext<T> context)
      Configures the Application.

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        void configure(ApplicationConfigurer configurer,
             ApplicationContext<T> context)
        Configures the Application.
        Parameters:
        configurer - Collects the Application configuration
        context - Used to access the environment, application configuration, and application (deployment) arguments
